 ██████╔╝╗ ███████║╗ ██████╔╝╗ █████╗══╝ ██████╔╝╗ ███████╗╝ ██║╔════╝ ██║╔══██║╗ ██║║  ██║║  ╚═██║╔
 ██╔═══╝╔╝ ██╔══██║║ ██╔═══╝╔╝ ██╔══╝╗   ██╔══██╗╝ ╚════██║╗ ██║║      ██║║  ██║║ ██║║  ██║║    ██║║
 ██║╔═══╝  ██║╔═██║║ ██║╔═══╝  ███████╗  ██║╔═██║╗ ███████║║ ╚██████╗  ╚██████╔╝║ ╚██████╔╝║    ██║║
 ╚═╝║      ╚═╝║ ╚═╝║ ╚═╝║      ╚══════╝╗ ╚═╝║ ╚═╝║ ╚══════╝║  ╚═════╝╗  ╚═════╝╔╝  ╚═════╝╔╝    ╚═╝║

Navigate arXiv findings with PaperScout.

Paste an arXiv URL in the Composer
Type an arXiv URL or identifier below and press Shift+Enter to fetch metadata.
Enter asks a question; Ctrl+Enter saves a note. Esc clears the composer.

Interactions will appear here once you load a paper.

Enter: ask • Ctrl+Enter: note • Shift+Enter: URL • Esc: clear
